sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the accurate timing of laboratory procedures.
sections.scope: Applicable to all timed activities in Pharmaceutical Analysis.
procedure: Power ON the timer and clear any previous settings.
Enter the required time duration using the numeric keypad or buttons.
When the alarm sounds, press 'STOP' to silence it.
Reset the timer for the next use.
Switch OFF the timer if it will not be used for a long period.
Replace batteries when the display becomes faint.
precautions: Keep the timer away from chemical spills and extreme heat.
Do not drop or subject the timer to mechanical shocks.
Ensure the alarm is audible in the laboratory environment.
Do not use the timer for critical timing if it shows a low battery signal.
Clean the casing with a dry cloth only.
